message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm looking for a price of $22,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit too low, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm still very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me at that price?
